question.hi: The statement ……………… will help your friend in building trust in you.
question.en: The statement ……………… will help your friend in building trust in you.

hi: You will try to help your friend when he/she is in difficulty.
You criticise your friend for his/her failure in private.
You will never give away your friend’s secrets.
You often arrive late when your friend needs you.

You criticise your friend for his/her failure in private.
You will never give away your friend’s secrets.

hi: The power to make people work for him/her
en: The power to make people work for him/her

question.hi: You visit a cloth shop, try many outfits and come out without purchasing anything. You tell the salesman that you do not like anything; you ……………..…

feel ashamed of not buying anything

Strict attachment to your own view

hi: Goals are purely personal so no general factors apply

There is no need to know our capabilities or habits

en: Goals are purely personal so no general factors apply

we can hide our mistakes from others
en: we can work to reduce our strengths and enhance our weaknesses
we can be authoritative and gain importance
We can develop our capabilities and thereby develop our personality
we can hide our mistakes from others
